 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
Packages
net.livebookstore.business Business facade serves web MVC and web services, and hides database operation details.
net.livebookstore.business.impl Implementation of business interfaces.
net.livebookstore.dao DAO interfaces that define common CRUD operations, make implementation pluggable.
net.livebookstore.dao.hibernate Implementation of DAO interfaces using Hibernate.
net.livebookstore.dao.jdbc  
net.livebookstore.domain Define all domain objects and a Page object for pagination.
net.livebookstore.exception Define exceptions.
net.livebookstore.hibernate Define CustomSQLDialect so that we can register our own bitand() SQL function.
net.livebookstore.jmx Define sampler to detect performance issue.
net.livebookstore.mail Define mail listener to send mails when JMS received.
net.livebookstore.raw.hibernate  
net.livebookstore.raw.jms  
net.livebookstore.raw.mail  
net.livebookstore.security Security services and utility that are integrated into Acegi security framework.
net.livebookstore.util Utilities to simplify some works.
net.livebookstore.web Controllers that can run as anonymous.
net.livebookstore.web.admin Controllers that must run as admin role.
net.livebookstore.web.core Define template controllers as super class for concrete controllers.
net.livebookstore.web.filter All filters that are used in this web application.
net.livebookstore.web.mbean Define MBean to collect performance information.
net.livebookstore.web.service Export Web Services to allow 3rd-part clients to search books.
net.livebookstore.web.user Controllers that must run as user role.
org.acegisecurity.ui.rememberme Fix Acegi 1.03 TokenBasedRememberMeServices' NullPointerException.
